Main Line: 281-292-4648  
Municipal Court: 281-292-8736  
Municipal Court Fax: 281-364-7168

CONTACT POLICE & PUBLIC WORKS

Oak Ridge North, TX 77385

Police (24-hour dispatch): 936-538-5900
